TopicTitle: Adding manually somes parts in technology tree ?

Articles.Content:
hello ,

I use the mod " Asmi 's ECLSS Mod" but I have a problem in the career mode . I do not have enough oxygen to make a simple return of the Mun . I can not add any oxygen tank because the parts are not available in the tech tree . Is there a way to add them manually by editing the CFG file? If so, anyone know how?

goodbye

Thank you.
